---START read conf_path.txt
file location of LRZs,loc_lrz.txt
file location of flybys,loc_flyby.txt
use same LRZ,0
use same geofence,1
number of flybys,2
random seed,12345
---END read conf_path.txt
---START LRZ
G1
LRZ,1,-1.000000,-1.000000
LRZ,2,-1.000000,0.000000
LRZ,3,0.000000,-1.000000
G2
LRZ,1,0.000000,0.000000
LRZ,2,1.000000,1.000000
LRZ,3,1.000000,0.000000
G3
LRZ,1,2.000000,2.000000
number of geofences 3
---END LRZ
---START flyby
flyby,1,-0.400000,0.400000
flyby,2,-0.500000,0.500000
flyby,3,1.100000,1.200000
number of flybys 3
---END flyby
---START paths
path,0,1,start,-1.000000,-1.000000,-0.500000,0.500000,-0.500000,0.500000,-1.000000,0.000000,end,0,2
path,0,2,start,-1.000000,0.000000,-0.500000,0.500000,1.100000,1.200000,0.000000,-1.000000,end,0,3
path,0,3,start,0.000000,-1.000000,-0.500000,0.500000,-0.500000,0.500000,-1.000000,0.000000,end,0,2
path,1,1,start,0.000000,0.000000,-0.500000,0.500000,1.100000,1.200000,1.000000,1.000000,end,1,2
path,1,2,start,1.000000,1.000000,1.100000,1.200000,-0.400000,0.400000,1.000000,0.000000,end,1,3
path,1,3,start,1.000000,0.000000,-0.400000,0.400000,-0.400000,0.400000,1.000000,1.000000,end,1,2
path,2,1,start,2.000000,2.000000,1.100000,1.200000,1.100000,1.200000,2.000000,2.000000,end,2,1
number of paths 7
---END paths
